stories.title: Meta signs 6-gigawatt AI chip deal with AMDPublished1 hour agoAMD issued Meta a warrant for up to 160 million shares, with vesting tied to shipment milestones across a multi-year GPU deployment.45 sources
MIT report exposes hidden human labor behind humanoid robots96 sources
CrowdStrike reports 89% surge in AI-powered cyberattacks49 sources
Anthropic CEO compares AI's rapid advance to a tsunami society is ignoring47 sources

Court filings show Meta exec called encryption plan 'so irresponsible'Published2 hours agoInternal documents reveal senior safety officials warned that encrypting Messenger would cripple detection of child exploitation, but Meta proceeded anyway.40 sources

Nvidia reports earnings amid booming Gulf chip exportsPublished2 hours agoThe AI chipmaker is set to release fiscal Q4 results on Feb. 25 as UAE and Saudi export deals reshape its global sales landscape.72 sources
SambaNova raises $350M, partners with Intel to challenge Nvidia in AI chips43 sources
Air Force begins weapons tests on new combat drones46 sources
Novo Nordisk reports 19.7% weight loss in triple agonist trial42 sources

Rival studies clash over fate of massive dying star WOH G64Published9 hours agoA Nature Astronomy paper published Feb. 23 says the star transformed into a yellow hypergiant, but a competing team says it never changed.53 sources

Internal documents show Meta researchers sought to study addictive features in 2018Published11 hours agoNewly released files reveal Facebook employees proposed auditing features like autoplay and endless scroll for compulsive effects, but the study was never carried out.46 sources
YouTube exec denies platform was designed to addict children81 sources
Amazon announces $12B Louisiana data center project amid Big Tech's AI spending surge68 sources
FDA approves swallowable weight-loss balloon as alternative to GLP-1 drugs56 sources

Apple to begin manufacturing Mac Mini in HoustonPublished11 hours agoThe move makes the compact desktop Apple's second consumer product assembled in the U.S., alongside the Mac Pro built in Austin since 2013.97 sources

DeepSeek trained AI model on banned Nvidia chips, US official saysPublished12 hours agoA senior Trump administration official alleged that the Chinese AI startup used Nvidia's most advanced Blackwell chip despite U.S. export controls barring shipments to China.50 sources
EPA criminal cases target wealthier counties, not the most polluted61 sources
Musk's xAI signs Pentagon deal for classified military AI55 sources
Anthropic launches up to $6B employee share sale54 sources

Tesla sues California DMV to reverse false advertising ruling on self-driving claimsPublished14 hours agoDays after complying with corrective measures, the automaker filed suit to erase the finding that its Autopilot and FSD marketing misled consumers.42 sources

Chinese yuan surges to 2.5-year high as markets reopenPublished18 minutes agoThe onshore yuan broke below the key 6.90 level against the dollar as traders priced in a more favorable tariff outlook after the Supreme Court struck down Trump's emergency duties.76 sources
Fed's Goolsbee warns against cutting rates based on AI productivity hopes64 sources
Stripe valued at $159B in new tender offer, up 70% in a year67 sources
Stellantis set to report first annual loss on Wednesday65 sources

Novo Nordisk to cut Ozempic, Wegovy list prices by up to 50%Published43 minutes agoThe price reductions to $675 a month come a day after Novo Nordisk shares plunged on disappointing trial results for its next-generation obesity drug.93 sources

Oil prices near 7-month highs ahead of U.S.-Iran talksPublished52 minutes agoBrent crude and WTI climbed sharply as traders priced in the risk of military escalation, with a third round of nuclear negotiations set for Thursday in Geneva.56 sources
Trump's new 10% global tariff takes effect amid AI-driven market turmoil60 sources
European stocks slide as AI disruption fears cross the Atlantic66 sources
Bitcoin on track for worst month since 2022 crash70 sources

Fed's Bostic says AI may cause unemployment it can't fixPublished2 hours agoThe outgoing Atlanta Fed president told Reuters the central bank cannot offset structurally higher unemployment driven by AI adoption.82 sources

Asian markets surge as chip giants hit records amid US AI sell-offPublished2 hours agoSamsung Electronics and SK Hynix reached historic price milestones as Asian indexes climbed, diverging sharply from a Wall Street sell-off driven by AI disruption fears.64 sources
World Bank secures record $6B insurance deal to expand lending44 sources
Tesla's European sales fall for 13th straight month as BYD surges ahead50 sources
ECB to launch credit underwriting review at euro zone banks next month88 sources

South Korea's Kospi hits record as emerging markets post historic rallyPublished2 hours agoThe benchmark index closed at an all-time high Tuesday as emerging market equities deliver their strongest outperformance against U.S. stocks in nearly two decades.76 sources

Barclays cuts Novo Nordisk CagriSema forecast by 80%Published2 hours agoAnalysts slashed peak sales estimates after trial data showed the obesity drug failed to match Eli Lilly's Zepbound in a head-to-head study.53 sources
SEC approves first intraday trading of a tokenized mutual fund50 sources
Hedge funds reverse course, buy tech stocks after weeks of heavy selling61 sources
SpaceX's planned $50B IPO forces rivals to rethink listings52 sources

Wall Street braces for Nvidia earnings amid DeepSeek chip controversyPublished2 hours agoNvidia reports fiscal Q4 results Wednesday with analysts expecting about $65.6 billion in revenue and fresh questions about its chips reaching China.56 sources
